snippet: Twelve people, including women and children, are being treated for possible exposure to chemical weapons agents in Mosul, where Islamic State is fighting off an offensive by U.S.-backed Iraqi forces, the United Nations said on Saturday....

headline.main: Zambia's Bwalya Pulls Out of FIFA Council Race
headline.print_headline: Zambia's Bwalya Pulls Out of FIFA Council Race

lead_paragraph: Twelve people, including women and children, are being treated for possible exposure to chemical weapons agents in Mosul, where Islamic State is fighting off an offensive by U.S.-backed Iraqi forces, the United Nations said on Saturday.
